nodes.text: The Sith Eternal crest, also known as a hex charm, was a dagger-shaped symbol traditionally used by Sith assassins.[source?]

It was adopted as the insignia of the Sith Eternal cult, whose Sith cultists, such as the assassin Ochi, adorned themselves with. Sith Eternal officers of the Final Order fleet wore specialized uniforms that included a kepi hat, which displayed the crest in the form of a sculpted metal piece.
